title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example exhibits excessive flashing when resizing the window vertically. This behavior is concerning and needs to be addressed.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The Control Example should not exhibit any flashing when resizing the window vertically. The interface elements should remain stable and steady during the resizing process.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Launch the Control Example.
2. Resize the window vertically only.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
